title.zh: 武汉：华中科技大学国际胜任力培养班
title.en: Wuhan: HUST International Competence Training Program

description.zh: 华中科技大学国际胜任力培养班开班仪式在武汉举行，左钰洁参加开班仪式,聆听联合国国际劳工组织前国家局局长李东林老师带来深度课程。该培养班旨在提升学生的国际视野和跨文化交流能力，培养具有国际竞争力的高素质人才。
description.en: The opening ceremony of Huazhong University of Science and Technology International Competence Training Program was held in Wuhan. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo attended the opening ceremony. The program aims to enhance students' international perspectives and cross-cultural communication skills, cultivating high-quality talents with international competitiveness.

title.zh: 国际胜任力培养班讨论

description.zh: 学员们就国际胜任力培养进行激烈探讨
description.en: Participants engaging in intense discussion on international competence development

description.zh: 学员们进行小组讨论和交流
